thread.title_full: Wedding in London - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: cherylmD6213HI
title: Wedding in London
text:
This residence was across the road from the wedding reception and was more affordable for us. We found the staff very helpful, very pleasant accommodation and wonderfully located in the West End. A must do - 6.30 am walk around the area, it is empty and beautiful without all other tourists. Limited parking.
Room Tip: Bath tub was a bit high so slightly difficult to get into. See more room tips
